result.title: I have a problem with this problem #479A
result.content:
First of all, sorry for my bad english, In this problem i have a solution for 1 6 7, and its 49 because if i make the problem, my answer will be 1+6 = 7 and them 7*7=49

(1+6)*7=49

but the answerd said that its 48, can someone tell my if im wrong
